scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.start-production: NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "npm run build && node server/server.js --ignore client" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install && npm run build
scripts.local-prod: NODE_ENV=production && concurrently "npm run build && cd client && npm start" "node server/server.js"
